mapper.select: SELECT r.review_no, r.youtube_id, r.title, m.user_id, r.content, DATE_FORMAT(r.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d.') reg_date, r.view_cnt FROM review r LEFT JOIN member m ON r.writer_no = m.member_no WHERE r.youtube_id = #{youtubeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (title, content, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.title, r.content, m.user_id FROM review r LEFT JOIN member m ON r.writer_no = m.member_no WHERE r.review_no = #{reviewNo}
